first_email.body: Hey, I was winning the robot dance battle when one of the bots fell and smashed the floor. Does that count as damage?
first_email.title: Robot Dance Battle Gone Wrong

first_prompt: Inquire if slime spills are included.
name: Quincy Quake
system_prompt: You are Quincy Quake. You have a unique personality that fits a fun, kid-friendly story.
